alice.tucson.api

Interface EnhancedSynchACC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BulkSynchACC, OrdinarySynchACC, RootACC, SpecificationSynchACC, SynchACC, UniformSynchACC
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EnhancedACC
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ACCProxyAgentSide

    public interface EnhancedSynchACC
extends SynchACC, BulkSynchACC, UniformSynchACC
    Enhanced Synchronous ACC. Can act both on the ordinary tuple space and on the specification tuple space. Bulk and uniform primitives are included.
    Author:
    ste (mailto: s.mariani@unibo.it)
    See Also:
    SynchACC, BulkSynchACC, UniformSynchACC

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface alice.tucson.api.OrdinarySynchACC

      • Methods inherited from interface alice.tucson.api.SpecificationSynchACC

      • Methods inherited from interface alice.tucson.api.RootACC

      • Methods inherited from interface alice.tucson.api.BulkSynchACC
